Articles.Content:
Hey, I've been around the forums for a while, but I haven't joined until now, so just saying Hi, I played the old 13.3 demo and could never get the hang of it, but I bought it a couple months ago and I'm hooked

I look foward to posting here
Welcome! And don't worry, most of us around here are hooked
I've been here a while, I don't post much. But can say KSP has an awesome community behind. Welcome.

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to see that you've taken the plunge, and we'll look forward to hearing you share your exploits. If you have any questions, feel free to stop by the Gameplay Questions and Tutorial subforum to ask, or check out some of our tutorials, especially the ones I've tried to list in the Drawing Board.

Hope this helps!
